# NLDistanceType.cosine

**Case**

A method of calculating distance by using cosine similarity.

## Declaration

```swift
case cosine
```

## Discussion

The range of a cosine distance is `[0.0, 2.0]`, derived from the expression `1 -` *cosine similarity*.
title: NLDistanceType.cosine
